title: Entering the House and Checking for Food
description: This training module demonstrates the process of entering the house, turning on the TV and lights, and checking the refrigerator for food.
transcript: Ok, so here's my process for entering my house. I come in, I open the door, I get the remote control and hit the power button on here to start up the TV. Then I come over to my place here and I turn on all the lights. Then once I'm done with that, I come over here and open the refrigerator to see if there's any food.

steps.title: Enter the House
steps.description: Open the door and step inside.

steps.title: Turn on the TV
steps.description: Locate the remote control and press the power button to start the TV.

steps.title: Turn on the Lights
steps.description: Go to the light switch and turn on all the lights in the area.

steps.title: Check the Refrigerator
steps.description: Walk to the refrigerator and open it to check for food.
